Spell Slots: Protean1: 1; Protean2: 1; Protean3: 1; Protean4: 1; Protean5: 1; Protean6: 1; Protean7: 1; Protean8: 1; Protean9: 1; S0: 9; S1: 7; S2: 7; S3: 7; S4: 6; S5: 6; S6: 6; S7: 6; S8: 6; S9: 6 Spell DC: Protean: 13; S: 13
Spells:
Black Tentacles (Spatial Tear4 Conj): R300' Tentacles in 20' radius grapple (BAB +25) and inflict 1d6+4 HP/rd for 20 rd
Blur (Protean2 Illu): Foes attacking touched have 20% miss chance for 20 min
Confusion (Protean4 Ench): R300' Creatures in 15' radius randomly 25% act normal/25% babble/25% attack themselves/25% attack nearest for 20 rd (DC 17 Will neg)
Dimension Door (Spatial Tear4 Conj): Teleports self and touched object or 6 willing creatures 1200'
Disintegrate (Protean6 Tran): R300' Ranged touch inflicts 40d6 HP (DC 19 Fort 5d6), dusts if target slain
Entropic Shield (Protean1 Abju): Ranged attacks on self suffer 20% miss for 20 min
Gaseous Form (Protean3 Tran): Touched becomes insubstantial (DR 10/magic, immune to poison, sneak attacks, and critical hits, unable to use spell components, fly 10') for 40 min
Greater Polymorph (Protean7 Tran): Willing target becomes animal, elemental, plant, or dragon for 20 min
Major Creation (Protean5 Conj): R75' Creates 20' cu plant or mineral object for up to 40 hr
Polymorph Any Object (Protean8 Tran): R75' Target becomes something else (DC 21 Fort neg)
Shapechange (Protean9 Tran): Self becomes different animal of any size 1/rd for 200 min
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Avatar Of Chaos: +2 save DC and spell penetration vs. lawful creatures
Bloodline Protean: +4 dispel DC on transmutation and creation spells
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Protoplasm: R30' Hurled protoplasm inflicts entanglement and 1 HP acid/rd for 1d3 rd 6/dy
Spatial Tear: May use combined Dimension Door and Black Tentacles effects 2/dy
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
